column4: Anyone know how to fix this? i run nautilus in terminal and get this "nautilus: error while loading shared libraries: libgnome-desktop-2.so.7: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory"
see which libgnome-desktop-2.so your system provides, upgrade the package that contains it or rebuild nautilus against you current libs
i have no idea, in the ubuntu manager it said that the new version was out so i updated, about 1hour and a half later it had finished and i had 9.04
